Package project.controllers.repository

Class RequestRepositoryController

java.lang.Object
project.controllers.repository.RequestRepositoryController
All Implemented Interfaces:
I_EnumRepositoryController<RequestType,​Request>, I_RepositoryController<Request>
public class RequestRepositoryController
extends java.lang.Object
implements I_EnumRepositoryController<RequestType,​Request>
A class that controls the interactions with the Request repositories.

    • approve

      public void approve​(Request request) throws java.lang.Exception
      Approve a request, then deletes it.
      Parameters:
      request - the target request to approve.
      Throws:
      ObjectNotFoundException - the request cannot be found in the repository.
      java.lang.Exception - if the request's approveAction throws an Exception.

    • deny

      public void deny​(Request request) throws java.lang.Exception
      Deny a request, then deletes it.
      Parameters:
      request - the target request to deny.
      Throws:
      ObjectNotFoundException - if the request cannot be found in the repository.
      java.lang.Exception - if the request's approveAction throws an Exception.
